parameters.name: DataSetId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a data set.

parameters.name: RevisionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a revision.

nested_items.name: Comment
nested_items.description: An optional comment about the revision.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the revision was created, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: DataSetId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the data set associated with the data set revision.

nested_items.name: Finalized
nested_items.description: To publish a revision to a data set in a product, the revision must first be finalized. Finalizing a revision tells AWS Data Exchange that changes to the assets in the revision are complete. After it's in this read-only state, you can publish the revision to your products. Finalized revisions can be published through the AWS Data Exchange console or the AWS Marketplace Catalog API, using the StartChangeSet AWS Marketplace Catalog API action. When using the API, revisions are uniquely identified by their ARN.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the revision.

nested_items.name: SourceId
nested_items.description: The revision ID of the owned revision corresponding to the entitled revision being viewed. This parameter is returned when a revision owner is viewing the entitled copy of its owned revision.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the revision was last updated, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: RevocationComment
nested_items.description: A required comment to inform subscribers of the reason their access to the revision was revoked.

nested_items.name: Revoked
nested_items.description: A status indicating that subscribers' access to the revision was revoked.

nested_items.name: RevokedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the revision was revoked, in ISO 8601 format.
